Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates President Trump's statement by attributing the quote "I can do my job without any intelligence whatsoever" to him, when in fact it originated from a satirical article.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the assertion that President Trump actually made this statement.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the quote attributed to President Trump is true, without verifying its authenticity.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the quote was actually from a satirical article and not a literal statement made by President Trump.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement bias in this claim.
Falters at times: There is no evidence of the claim faltering at times.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the quote originated from a satirical article by Andy Borowitz and was falsely attributed to President Trump.
